itemDescription: First Ghanaian woman to lead a multi-national telecommunications company in Ghana. She is also a passionate believer in excellence and integrity

wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Quist, née Afriyie, (born c. 1974) is a Ghanaian-British business and technology executive. She is a managing director for Morgan Stanley

response: * Lucy Quist – first Ghanaian woman to become the CEO of a multinational telecommunications company in Ghana
* Lucy Quist, first Ghanaian woman to become the CEO of a multinational telecommunications company in Ghana
*Lucy Quist - first Ghanaian woman to become the CEO of a multinational telecommunications company in Ghana
* Lucy Quist (born 1974), Ghanaian business executive in England
*Lucy Quist, Managing Director and Head of Change Leadership, Morgan Stanley
*Lucy Quist, President of African Institute of Mathematical Sciences, Ghana
